translations: n．苗条，纤细：指身材修长、纤细的特点。
· Her svelteness is the result of a strict diet and exercise regimen.
她的苗条身材是严格饮食和锻炼计划的结果。

sentences.sentence: Judgmental observers of this pattern might simply blame lack of willpower—and it is certainly true that willpower in prodigious quantities is needed to climb back up the slope to svelteness.
sentences.translation: 喜欢妄下结论的旁观者对于这一案例也许简单地将其归咎于为缺乏意志力——当然，攀登通往“苗条”顶峰的斜坡需要惊人的意志力。
